Charleston, SC

Since 1987, California Dreaming has been a proud part of the Charleston, SC community. Our spacious, open setting features floor-to-ceiling windows that offer stunning views of the Ashley River, creating the perfect backdrop for a lively night out. You can also enjoy these panoramic views from our wrap-around deck, complete with a bar and easily accessible by boat. Whether you're craving low country favorites or our famous prime rib, California Dreaming is a favorite among both locals and tourists.
Please note that we provide Advance Priority Seating to reduce wait times and expedite the seating process when your entire party arrives. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 6. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 1 Ashley Point Dr

Augusta, GA

Since 1997, the well-liked, locally appreciated neighborhood place in Augusta, GA has been California Dreaming. The warm and inviting atmosphere with comfortable booth seating and open kitchen is great for families and date-nights alike. Specializing in high-quality, fresh ingredients like thick-cut steaks, tavern-style sandwiches, and of course, its namesake salad. Open for lunch and dinner, featuring patio dining and online ordering with curbside pickup.
To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 6. 3241 Washington Rd.

Spanish Fort, AL

Universally admired, California Dreaming in Spanish Fort, AL, located in the Eastern Shore outdoor shopping center, has been serving much-loved American classics since 2007. The consistent, hearty menu, lively bar-area – including tv’s for sports fans, and spacious patio, creates a welcoming atmosphere for everyone. Open for lunch and dinner with happy hour daily from 3PM and online ordering & curbside pickup.
To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 8. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 30500 State Hwy 181

Surfside Beach, SC

Open for lunch and dinner with patio dining and convenient online ordering.

Columbia, SC

Located in downtown Columbia, SC, inside the historic 1902 Union Station, California Dreaming welcomes guests with its vibrant and inviting atmosphere. The restaurant's floor-to-ceiling windows offer a picturesque view of the rail tracks, stretching from the inactive platform to the main terminal. Paired with our hearty, made-from-scratch menu, it's no wonder California Dreaming has been a beloved local institution since 1984. Open for lunch and dinner daily, including online ordering with curbside pickup.

Celebrating 40 years, California Dreaming has been a valued part of the Columbia community. Union Station, its historic home, was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1973.
Please note that we provide Advance Priority Seating to reduce wait times and expedite the seating process when your entire party arrives. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 8. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 401 South Main St.

Charleston, SC

Since 1987, California Dreaming has been a proud part of the Charleston, SC community. Our spacious, open setting features floor-to-ceiling windows that offer stunning views of the Ashley River, creating the perfect backdrop for a lively night out. You can also enjoy these panoramic views from our wrap-around deck, complete with a bar and easily accessible by boat. Whether you're craving low country favorites or our famous prime rib, California Dreaming is a favorite among both locals and tourists.
Please note that we provide Advance Priority Seating to reduce wait times and expedite the seating process when your entire party arrives. To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 6. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 1 Ashley Point Dr

Greenville, SC

Sidle up to one of the bar stools overlooking the restaurant or grab a seat by window, the vibrant atmosphere at California Dreaming is inviting for families and date-nights alike. The large, open interior decked with limestone and expansive kitchen has a dedicated team cooking American classics from scratch daily. Don’t leave without ordering a thick-cut broiled steak or honey-butter croissants. Proudly serving the Greenville, SC community since 1991. Open for lunch and dinner daily, featuring patio seating as well as online ordering with curbside pickup.
To ensure the best experience for all guests, we seat groups of up to 8. While larger groups are seated separately, this arrangement is flexible during quieter hours. 40 Beacon Dr.
